patterns: how is placement in your college
responses: Our college has a dedicated placement cell that helps students secure placements in reputed companies. The placement record varies from year to year and across different branches.

Our college has a good placement record with students being placed in reputed companies. The placement process includes training sessions, mock interviews, and placement drives organized by the placement cell.

patterns: what is the ranking of your college
responses: Our college is consistently ranked among the top engineering colleges in the region. For specific rankings, you can refer to various ranking agencies' websites.

Our college offers scholarships to deserving students based on their academic performance and financial need. You can contact the college administration or visit the scholarship page on our website for more information.
Our college timings are from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM, Monday to Friday. On Saturdays, the college closes at 12:00 PM.
